title: Even Riot is moving on from league
body:
https://www.pcgamesn.com/riot-new-game?amp

Apparently Riot is looking to "put the S back in Riot Games"

While they are not giving up on league, it seems like it is finally going the way of WoW and will eventually decline into a fraction of what it was. 

What are your guys thoughts on this?

I wonder what kind of "hardcore gamer" games they are looking into developing
